item.description:
This is totally the Bomb the last Saturday of the month they have free entertainment with dinner, and you can bring your own bottle :-) The stuffed grape leaves are to die for ! I just went to this belly dancing event it was outstanding _ Had a great time :-)

Celadon Tribal returns for our monthly Tribal Belly Dance night
at the *Beautiful* Kasbah Garden Cafe at 105 Howe St, New Haven, CT

We're starting anew, and Celadon will be your hostesses for these special nights in the garden featuring guest dancers, musicians, Joy and Laura's students, fire dancing, and of course, Celadon Tribal Belly Dance!
Bring your favorite bottle of wine, and come enjoy wonderful food, atmosphere and dance!

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: BYOB At Kasbah Garden Cafe
